name: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M.
overview: Experience the thrills and action of standing alone against an entire alien invasion in ARMORINES: Project S.W.A.R.M. for Game Boy Color. You're just one Armorine against an entire race of vicious alien bugs bent on destroying all human life on Venus. Play through six overhead levels full of action and puzzles. Beware, because the enemy is intelligent and won't hesitate to use strategy to defeat you. Make use of five different weapons, including the laser, the flamethrower, and the plasma rifle to deal with the relentless assault. Work your way through a variety of levels all the way up to the Mothership, where you'll put a stop to this invasion for good! ARMORINES: Project S.W.A.R.M. features a wide variety of well-detailed enemies along with richly-colored graphics that will draw you right into the action. Use the password function to continue the fight another day!
